Makefile templates

builtin local varables:

  • packed_filename
  • unpack_dir
  • current_package_dir
  • package_file_dir
  • url
  • dependencies
  • target
  • section_name
  • function_name
  • Add function parameters to local variables
  • Add target variables for local targets, to local variables
